name: Cork Lightweight Yoga Mat “The Robin”
description:
description
benefits



This is our most popular and signature mat -- it is ultra light and beautifully smooth. The sustainable cork is non-slip with natural anti-microbial properties that resist mold, mildew and bad smells.
At 5 mm thick, there is a comfortable dense foam base that is free of PVC’s. Complimentary cotton yoga mat strap included. With the feeling of nature beating within you, we wish you a pure and inspiring yoga practice.



Suitable for all styles of yoga. For hot yoga, you can go towel-free and will not need to deal with a smelly mat.
Top side: 100% sustainable cork that provides a superior grip in both dry and wet conditions. Cork is naturally antimicrobial and self-cleaning.
Bottom side: Comfortable, 5mm thick slip-resistant foam, which upholds our eco-conscious values – 100% recyclable, and free of PVC, plasticizers, and latex.
Lightweight which makes for a perfect travel mat.
Attractive design will look good no matter where it is stored.
Available in one of our bundles

Specifications: 72″ x 26” | 5mm thick | 1.9 lbs. | 4 in. diameter rolled
Pro Tip: For extra grip, spray water on your mat in the area your hands and feet go before practice

name: Cork Lightweight Yoga Mat, Massage Balls and Yoga Block Bundle - "The Flock"
description:
description
benefits



The cork lightweight yoga mat, massage balls, and yoga block by 42 Birds will complete your yoga and fitness routine. Fully sustainable and eco-friendly, the cork material is non-slip with anti-microbial and self-cleaning properties that resist mold, mildew, and bad smells. 
With cork, you can finally avoid toxins and chemicals via rubber/plastic, which are used in most yoga and fitness products. The beauty and elegance of cork will look great in your home and yoga studio.
Includes: 1 Cork Lightweight Yoga Mat "The Robin," 1 Cork Therapy Massage Ball Set "The Little Owls," and 2 Cork Blocks "The Nuthatch."

Specifications: Cork Lightweight Mat = 72″ x 26” | 5mm thick | 1.9 lbs. | 4 in. diameter rolled | Cork Block = 9” x 6” x 4”, 2.2 lbs | Massage Balls = (2) 60mm diameter 140g balls and (1) 20mm diameter 20g ball


The cork lightweight yoga mat offers perfect grip, even in the sweatiest yoga practices. In fact, when moisture is added, the grip increases!
The cork massage balls are perfect for relieving tension and improving muscle function. Decrease soreness, increase flexibility, and improve your energy with myofascial release. 

The cork yoga block provides a comfortable yet firm grip, not found in foam blocks. Built to be sturdy, grounding, non-slip, and safe for all postures.

name: Wild Thing Bra - White
description: Cute ruching down the front, a gently supportive fit, a waist-skimming crop… the Wild Thing combines the best elements of a bra and a crop top. As for the Airbrush fabric, it’s an Alo signature that’s breathable, incredibly soft, and constructed with four-way-stretch for a perfect fit. Style it with leggings and shorts (for movement) or trousers and skirts (for style).

name: High-Waist Airbrush Legging - White
description: Pilates, pickleball, posting up at home—you’re looking at your new go-to for all of it. Made from our signature Airbrush fabric that’s cottony soft with a smoothing fit, these leggings are thoughtfully designed with a holds-you-in high-rise waistband and full-length legs for a snug fit right down to the hems. Grab your favorite color, and while you’re at it, get a matching bra, too.

name: Airbrush Heart Throb Bra - Black/White
description: Way too cute to cover up. This bra features contrasting stitching, a gently-scooped neck and a low back, all done in our signature Airbrush fabric for a soft and comfortably compressive fit. It’s perfect for medium-intensity workouts like dance, yoga or Pilates, and even cuter with the matching Heart Throb Legging.

name: Airbrush High-Waist Heart Throb Legging - Black/White
description: It’s the legging that does it all. The Airbrush High-Waist Heart Throb Legging is cut from our signature cotton matte Airbrush fabric that lifts, smooths, and sculpts. Contrast stitching traces every curve, while sweetheart shaping in the back defines and flatters. Designed with a stay-put logo waistband and just the right amount of stretch, it’s as performance-ready as it is street-approved. Pair it with the matching Airbrush Heart Throb Bra for a full knockout look.

name: Airbrush Real Bra Tank - Black
description: When you want the coverage of a tank and the support of a bra, reach for this. The Real Bra Tank has wide straps, a flattering V-neck, a built-in shelf bra and a racerback. Made from our signature Airbrush fabric that’s super soft with medium compression, you’ll go from Pilates to perusing the farmers market without missing a beat.

name: Airbrush High-Waist 7/8 Bootcut Legging - Black
description: You’re obsessed with bootcut looks, and we don’t blame you — it’s now available in our bestselling 7/8 length. The Airbrush High-Waist 7/8 Bootcut Legging in sculpting performance Airbrush is sweet from every angle, with a wide waistband & a forward, flared leg. Show them off with your favorite cropped tee or bra top & you’re ready to hit practice or pavement.

name: Alosoft Crop Finesse Short Sleeve - White
description: Strong in the studio, sweet on the street. The Alosoft Crop Finesse Short Sleeve has all the performance qualities you love, plus a baby tee silhouette and super-soft feel. It’s a yoga wardrobe staple.

name: Warrior Mat - Black
description: This mat supports you literally and figuratively. Reach new levels of performance with our rigorously tested Warrior mat. Its luxe matte finish, oversized, slip-free design, and anti-odor & moisture-wicking qualities help you stay grounded through all your moves. It’s also 100% formaldehyde-free, non-toxic, and PVC-free, perfect for a clean practice and a peaceful movement session.

name: Airlift Strength Extreme High-Waist 7/8 Legging - Navy
description: Done in stretchy, sheeny Airlift with a bonded, extra-high-rise waist, these leggings conform to your figure like a glove. As for the ⅞-length legs, they’re perfect for petites or an above-the-ankle fit. Pair them with a sweatshirt and the matching Strength Bra for a look you’ll keep in heavy rotation.

name: Airlift Line Up Bra - Black
description: Our ultralight Airlift fabric, in an essential silhouette. The Airlift Line Up Bra sets it up to knock ‘em down during a super-sweaty hot yoga sesh or on the street. Flocking details, removable cups, and skinny adjustable straps give a clean, finished look. Pair with the matching Airlift 7/8 High-Waist Line Up legging for all-day wicking and breathing.

name: Airlift High-Waist 7/8 Line Up Legging - Black
description: Studio, street, lounge: no problem. The Airlift High-Waist 7/8 Line Up Legging goes everywhere and makes it look easy. With cool flocking and sweetheart detailing on the back, it’s a versatile look that also happens to be epic. Don’t forget the matching bra to complete the set.

name: Yoga Strap - Black/Anthracite
description: When things are a little out of reach, this yoga strap brings connection and support to any posture. Bonus points for the ALO logo, and the fact that it doubles as a mat strap—loop the ends around your mat for hands-free carrying.

name: Uplifting Yoga Block - Black/Silver
description: Lightweight, with just the right level of firmness, the Uplifting Yoga Block is exactly what you need to level up your practice and maintain stability during poses.

name: Wild Thing Bra - Black
description: Cute ruching down the front, a gently supportive fit, a waist-skimming crop… the Wild Thing combines the best elements of a bra and a crop top. As for the Airbrush fabric, it’s an Alo signature that’s breathable, incredibly soft, and constructed with four-way-stretch for a perfect fit. Style it with leggings and shorts (for movement) or trousers and skirts (for style).

name: Lightweight Warrior Mat - Black
description: You asked and we answered. The Warrior Mat now comes in a new lighter weight. It has the thickness and comfort of the classic Warrior Mat that you know and love, but it now comes in a lighter weight that makes it easy to go from car to class.

name: Grounded No-Slip Towel - Black
description:
Find stillness in every asana with the Grounded No-Slip Mat Towel. Soft front absorbs sweat for maximum comfort and stability. A silicone grip pattern backing sticks to your mat for a slip-free practice.

Soft & absorbent
Silicone pattern backing for added grip
Cool ALO logo

name: Airlift Intrigue Bra - Espresso
description: Here’s why the Intrigue Bra will be your new go-to: It’s made from our signature Airlift fabric for a supportive, snug fit that’s ready for everything from HIIT to headstands. The cut is simple but flattering, designed with a scoop-neck, adjustable straps that crisscross in back for extra lift, and a keyhole cutout. Wear it with sweats to cozy up at home, with matching Airlift leggings to make a cute set… Really, when won’t you reach for it?

name: 7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging - Espresso
description: Wondering why these leggings are a fan favorite? Maybe it’s the sculpting, subtly sheeny, high-compression Airlift fabric. Or the fact that they fit like a glove, complete with a wide, double-layered waistband for a holds-you-in feel. Or the ⅞ length hems that are perfect for petites or an above-the-ankle fit. Pick your color and get ready to wear yours on repeat.

It’s also 100% formaldehyde-free, non-toxic, and PVC-free, perfect for a clean practice and a peaceful movement session.

name: Women's Pivot Barre Sock - Black
description: A must for studio classes, the no-show Pivot Barre Sock has no-slip grips, cushioning soles and fit-perfecting elastic straps, so you can stay comfortable through every workout.

name: Yoga Strap - Jungle
description: When things are a little out of reach, this yoga strap brings connection and support to any posture. Bonus points for the ALO logo, and the fact that it doubles as a mat strap—loop the ends around your mat for hands-free carrying.

description: Here’s why the Intrigue Bra will be your new go-to: It’s made from our signature Airlift fabric for a supportive, snug fit that’s ready for everything from HIIT to headstands. The cut is simple but flattering, designed with a scoop-neck, adjustable straps that crisscross in back for extra lift, and a keyhole cutout. Wear it with sweats to cozy up at home, with matching Airlift leggings to make a cute set… Really, when won’t you reach for it?

name: 3" High-Waist Airlift Short - Black
description: Our signature Airlift fabric has major stay-put power (no riding up or rolling down), a sculpting fit and a sleek, shiny finish. The flattering high-rise fit is snug and comfortable, and it’s finished with a 3-inch inseam. Pair with your favorite hoodie or crop top, or make it a matching set with an Airlift bra.

name: Alosoft Crop Finesse Long Sleeve - Black
description: From warm-up to workout to lounge, the Alosoft Crop Finesse Long Sleeve has your back. Yoga-level performance, super-soft feel, snug silhouette, check.

name: Alosoft High-Waist 7/8 Highlight Legging - Black
description: This staple does double duty. The Alosoft High-Waist 7/8 Highlight Legging is teched out for yoga and velvet-soft for whatever’s next. With a clean finish and contouring back seam, it goes great with all your favorite Alo.

name: ALO Water Bottle - Black
description: The wait is over—meet the ALO Water Bottle, the aluminum bottle that will help you keep hydrated through all your moves. It features a twist-off cap and a handle that makes it easy to carry from hot yoga to cardio sessions with ease.

name: Airlift High-Waist 7/8 Rebel Legging - Black
description: Full transparency—we love a mesh panel. And the Airlift Rebel Legging shows that. With its artfully placed mesh panels on the calve and waist, this style has perfected the intentional reveal. Be the envy of every workout class with this chic piece. Pair it with the matching Airlift Rebel Bra for an elevated look that hits every time.

name: 7/8 High-Waist Airbrush Legging - Black
description: The 7/8 High-Waist Airbrush Legging — all the smoothing, sculpting benefits of the full-length version, in a perfectly cropped package. So good for studio & all-day cool for street, this look features flat-locked seaming for comfort and functionality, no side seams, and an on-trend high waist.

name: High-Waist Alosoft Lounge Legging - Athletic Heather Grey
description: Cut from our softest performance fabric to date, the High-Waist Alosoft Lounge Legging is seriously comfy & so on-point for practice & beyond. Ribbed details at the waistband & cuffs and a sweet, contouring back seam for added lift give this forever-fave status. Throw on your fave ALO coverup or make it a full look with a super-soft Alosoft bra look.

name: Ananday Cork Yoga Mat
description:
Our bestselling Cork Yoga Mat — designed to support your body + our planet. Consciously made from plant-based, plastic-free materials — renewable cork + natural tree rubber. No plastic. No harsh chemicals. No toxins. 100% biodegradable.
The premium cork top layer releases an organic grip-enhancing substance when wet, making it even more slip-resistant with sweat — no towel necessary! And because cork is made from tree bark, it's naturally antimicrobial, preventing grime build-up and odors. The cork is fused with a cushioned tree rubber base for ultimate comfort to keep joints happy and healthy. Get ready for next level traction, support and stability, no matter how much you move or sweat.
Cork is one of the most earth-friendly materials available. No trees are cut down during harvest. The bark is stripped by hand every 9 years and regenerates itself. A harvested cork tree absorbs up to 5x more CO2 than one that isn’t cultivated.
 
"Perfect Grip! Best Mat! I have been practicing yoga for almost 15 years, have tried Manduka, Liforme, Jade, and the Ananday is my favorite. I love that it is sustainable. Definitely recommend!" — Maria
"Best. Mat. Ever. Totally non-slip for sweaty hot yoga, supports sensitive knees (I often have to use a blanket for the knees, but not with this mat), great thickness, beautiful, well-made, biodegradable... I've tried so many mats, and this one is undoubtedly my favorite. Love at first use. Using these mats for the rest of my life!" — Anton
"Finally, a yoga mat where my hands don't slip! I've had a hard time finding a yoga mat where my sweaty hands don't slide but this cork yoga mat did the trick!" — Nick
1 mat = 1 tree planted 🌳 
 

Product details


72" x 24" x 4mm | 5.4 lbs
Renewable cork + natural tree rubber

Natural, non-toxic, plastic-free

Non-slip and sweat resistant

Rolls out flat and stays put
Unmatched comfort and stability 

Antimicrobial — goodbye funky odors
Reversible — flip to rubber side for extra traction
Plastic-free production and packaging

100% biodegradable (learn how we pack)

*Traction tip — spray water around hands and feet before practice for extra grip.
*Advanced tip — if you're practicing inversions like forearm stand and handstand and would like to maximize traction, flip the mat over.
Why cork?

Cork releases an organic grip-enhancing substance when wet so it gets even more grippy with sweat — no towel necessary!
Made from bark, which forms to protect trees, so it's naturally antimicrobial and stays earthy and fresh day in, day out.

Cork is one of the most earth-friendly materials. No trees are cut down during harvest. The bark is collected by hand every 9 years and regenerates itself. Cork oak trees can live up to 200 years and a harvested tree absorbs up to 5x more CO2 than one that isn’t cultivated. Cork trees support some of the world’s most biodiverse forests.
Practicing on materials from the earth is grounding. Our hands and feet have marma points (or energy pathways) that connect to the planet's subtle energy. Grounding balances biological rhythms, calms the nervous system, and helps our body heal.

Care


Roll your mat up loosely, careful to not fold or crease


Cork is naturally antimicrobial, preventing germ and odor buildup; for a deeper clean, simply spray with a natural mat cleaner and let dry

Cleaning recommended 1x weekly (more frequently with heated classes) to prevent body oils from building up and to keep the mat feeling fresh
Since this mat is biodegradable and will (eventually) decompose, prolong its life by avoiding direct sunlight and extended water exposure

With extensive use, surface cracking may occur — this is purely visual and does not affect the feel or durability of the mat


End of life

Cork and tree rubber are 100% biodegradable
If and when you're ready to part with your mat, consider a donation or drop it off at a recycling center
Our packaging is also biodegradable and recyclable — learn how we pack

Happiness guarantee
We're a small woman-owned brand committed to quality and sustainability. Our pieces are made from natural, sustainable, plant-based materials — no plastics, no toxins, 100% biodegradable and recyclable, including the packaging. We love our products and think you will too! But if you're not 100% satisfied with your purchase, return or exchange within 30 days, no questions asked.

name: Ground + Stretch Bundle
description:
Get ready to to ground your practice and deepen your flow. This bundle features our bestselling Cork Yoga Mat and Align Yoga Strap for effortless support, alignment, and sustainability.
Cork Yoga Mat
Ground your practice with our bestselling non-slip Cork Yoga Mat. Consciously made from renewable cork and natural tree rubber, 100% biodegradable, plastic-free, and non-toxic — because sustainability should feel as good as it looks.
The cork surface gets grippier with sweat, so no towel is needed, while naturally antimicrobial properties prevent grime and odor buildup to keep the mat earthy and fresh. With a cushioned natural rubber base for extra joint support, it’s made to support your body no matter how much you move or sweat.
Align Yoga Strap
Safely deepen postures while maintaining alignment. Designed with a fixed loop on one end for quick and easy adjustments. Seamlessly modify the strap length to support different modifications and stretches.
Made from 100% GOTS-certified organic cotton and lightweight brushed zinc (ding-resistant) components, it’s free of toxins, synthetics, and harsh dyes found in conventional yoga straps. Secure and non-slip even in the most sweaty circumstances.
Use a yoga strap to: increase flexibility, deepen stretches, assist with hard-to-reach asanas, enhance warm ups, strengthen and tone, and add challenge to workouts.
Not sure how to use a strap? Check out our FREE Block & Strap eBook →
1 product = 1 tree planted 🌳 
 
Details

Cork Yoga Mat: 72" x 24" x 4mm | 5.4 lbs
Align Yoga Strap: 6' | 0.3 lbs

Why use a strap?

Make new poses accessible
Safely modify postures
Improve alignment
(Safely) increase flexibility
Explore deeper variations
Build strength through resistance
Support release in a restorative practice

Care

Roll your mat up loosely, careful to not fold or crease
Cork is naturally antimicrobial, preventing germ and odor buildup; for a deeper clean, simply spray with a natural mat cleaner and let dry
Cleaning recommended 1x weekly, more frequently with heated classes, to keep the mat feeling fresh
With extensive use, surface cracking may occur — this is purely visual and does not affect the feel or durability of the mat
Align Yoga Strap: hand or machine washable, natural detergent recommended, hang or lay flat to air dry

End of life

Cork and tree rubber are 100% biodegradable
Organic cotton is compostable, metal parts are recyclable
No plastic is used in production or packaging — learn how we pack


Happiness guarantee
We're a small woman-owned brand committed to quality and sustainability. Our pieces are made from natural, sustainable, plant-based materials — no plastics, no toxins, 100% biodegradable and recyclable, including the packaging. We love our products and think you will too! But if you're not 100% satisfied with your purchase, return or exchange within 30 days, no questions asked.

name: Home Yoga Starter Set
description:
Transform any space into a sanctuary with our bestselling essentials bundle. All the pieces you need to support and elevate your flow. Includes our Cork Yoga Mat, Cork Yoga Block Set, and Align Yoga Strap – designed to gently hold space for your body (mind and soul) and meet you exactly where you are.
Cork Yoga Mat: Ground your practice with our bestselling non-slip Cork Yoga Mat. Consciously made from renewable cork and natural tree rubber, 100% biodegradable, plastic-free, and non-toxic — because sustainability should feel as good as it looks. The cork surface gets grippier with sweat, so no towel is needed, while naturally antimicrobial properties prevent grime and odor buildup to keep the mat earthy and fresh. With a cushioned natural rubber base for extra joint support, it’s made to support your body no matter how much you move or sweat.
Cork Yoga Block Set: Use two blocks together to stabilize both sides of your body, symmetrically deepen poses, and find balance through every transition. Made from high-density, sustainably harvested premium cork, these blocks offer a firm, non-slip grip — no toppling, no slipping, just steady, reliable support. Designed with softly rounded edges to comfortably fit the curves of your body. Adjustable to three heights for customizable stability. Whether you're working on improving flexibility, exploring inversions, supporting restorative poses, or strengthening and toning, our blocks moves with you, sweat and all.
Align Yoga Strap: Safely deepen postures while maintaining alignment. Designed with a fixed loop on one end for quick and easy adjustments. Seamlessly modify the strap length to support different modifications and stretches. Crafted from 100% GOTS-certified organic cotton and lightweight brushed zinc (ding-resistant) components, it’s free of toxins, synthetics, and harsh dyes found in conventional yoga straps. Secure and non-slip even in the most sweaty situations.


1 product = 1 tree planted 🌳 
 
Details

Cork Yoga Mat: 72" x 24" x 4mm | 5.4 lbs
2 Cork Yoga Blocks: 4” x 6” x 9” | 2 lbs each
Align Yoga Strap: 6' | 0.3 lbs



Why cork?


Cork releases an organic grip-enhancing substance when wet so it gets even more grippy with sweat — no towel necessary!
Made from bark, which forms to protect trees, so it's naturally antimicrobial and stays earthy and fresh day in, day out.

Cork is one of the most earth-friendly materials. No trees are cut down during harvest. The bark is collected by hand every 9 years and regenerates itself. Cork oak trees can live up to 200 years and a harvested tree absorbs up to 5x more CO2 than one that isn’t cultivated. Cork trees support some of the world’s most biodiverse forests.

Practicing on materials from the earth is grounding. Our hands and feet have marma points (or energy pathways) that connect to the planet's subtle energy. Grounding balances biological rhythms, calms the nervous system, and helps our body heal.


Care

Roll your mat up loosely, careful to not fold or crease
Cork is naturally antimicrobial, preventing germ and odor buildup; for a deeper clean, simply spray with a natural mat cleaner and let dry
Cleaning recommended 1x weekly, more frequently with heated classes — this helps prevent body’s oils from building up and keeps the mat feeling fresh
Align Yoga Strap: hand or machine washable, natural detergent recommended, hang or lay flat to air dry



End of life

Cork and tree rubber are 100% biodegradable
Organic cotton is compostable, metal parts are recyclable
No plastic is used in production or packaging — learn how we pack



Happiness guarantee
We're a small woman-owned brand committed to quality and sustainability. Our pieces are made from natural, sustainable, plant-based materials — no plastics, no toxins, 100% biodegradable and recyclable, including the packaging. We love our products and think you will too! But if you're not 100% satisfied with your purchase, return or exchange within 30 days, no questions asked.

Measurements: 68"L x 24"W x 6mm.
Materials: PVC. Latex-Free. 
Care Instructions: Yoga mats release a very strong but harmless odor when first unwrapped. Please unroll and air out your mat for 2-3 days before use. Spot clean with our Yoga Mat Wash or damp cloth with cold water and mild detergent. Dry flat. The mat may fade and become brittle and unusable if exposed to the sun for extended periods of time. We recommend storing your mat in a mat bag when not in use. Learn more about How to Remove That New Yoga Mat Smell.

name: Africa by Jess Guzman Yoga mat - Art Collection - 4mm
description:
CONOCE A LA ARTISTA
JESS GUZMAN, Colombiana, Arquitecta de profesión y artista de vocación. Me encuentro muy inclinado hacia la pintura; dibuja y pinta desde niña porque eso la hace sentir libre. Encuentra en lápiz y papel la manera de materializar sus pensamientos y emociones.
Suele inspirarse en las formas de la naturaleza, y su estilo es una mezcla entre boceto, caricatura y abstracción.
La idea de dibujar para House of Mats la entusiasmó. Le encanta el concepto que Lucía, la dueña, tiene de la marca, pero más que eso, la historia que hay detrás y las razones que la motivaron.
Las ilustraciones de House surgen del concepto mismo de la marca: los colores, las posturas, la conexión con la naturaleza, la energía del sol y del universo, dando como resultado una serie de imágenes sencillas, realizadas a mano con un trazo suave, la que comunican los conceptos básicos del yoga.
Nada es absoluto, todo es complementario, y de ese tránsito surge la idea.
Sobre el diseño: El elefante en general es un animal que se asemeja a los humanos, es sociable y disfruta de la unión familiar. Además, los elefantes crean fuertes lazos con su familia y amigos, hasta el punto de poder identificarse después de un tiempo sin verse.

name: Airy Blue Yoga mat - Laboratory Limited Edition - 3.5mm
description:
Airy Blue is like a breath of fresh air, light and freeing. It’s the color of open skies and boundless horizons, inviting you to expand your mind and let your spirit soar. This mat is for those who seek clarity and peace, offering a space where you can let go of stress and embrace the lightness of being.
-
"Mat laboratory" , a collection created from experimentation with colors and textures that awaken the senses thanks to their originality and detail. Each model stands out for its unique and modern design, representing a disruptive way of distinguishing our brand.
At the Laboratory we are dedicated to the study of sensations through constant innovation in materials and colors, with a meticulous focus on quality and sustainability. Our mats are produced in a thickness of 3.5mm, achieving the perfect weight so you can easily transport them wherever you want.
What distinguishes it?
Unique and original design: Each mat features a carefully selected combination of colors and textures.
Constant innovation: Materials and colors developed through detailed studies.
Quality and sustainability: Committed to high quality and environmentally friendly products.
Portability: 3.5mm thickness for adequate weight and easy transportation.
Our differential?
Modern and disruptive style, Ideal for those looking to stand out.
Enhanced sensations, designed to enhance your senses.
Easy to carry, perfect for moving anywhere effortlessly.

name: Daylight moth Yoga mat by Ula Basinska - Art Collection - 4mm
description:
CONOCE AL ARTISTA
Ula Basinska. Pintora desde que tiene memoria. Nacida en Polonia, viviendo en la Patagonia Argentina, ella vibra el sentimiento de ser parte de la naturaleza y la majestuosa calma del sur y sus lagos.
Sus pinturas reflejan los milagros de la tierra que la rodea. Ella trabaja con acuarelas porque la encuentra viva, impredecible y al mismo tiempo ligera y sutil.
Para este diseño, Ula combinó su arte manual con la edición digital creando negativos que parecen versiones nocturnas de imágenes pintadas durante el día.
Sentirás las luces y las sombras durante tu práctica. Dualismo y unión.

name: Nightlight tribe by Ula Basinska - Art Collection - 4mm
description:
CONOCE A LA ARTISTA
Ula Basinska. Pintora desde que tiene memoria. Nacida en Polonia, viviendo en la Patagonia Argentina, ella vibra el sentimiento de ser parte de la naturaleza y la majestuosa calma del sur y sus lagos.
Sus pinturas reflejan los milagros de la tierra que la rodea. Ella trabaja con acuarelas porque la encuentra viva, impredecible y al mismo tiempo ligera y sutil.
Para este diseño, Ula combinó su arte manual con la edición digital creando negativos que parecen versiones nocturnas de imágenes pintadas durante el día.
Sentirás las luces y las sombras durante tu práctica. Dualismo y unión.

name: Jade Harmony Yoga Mat - JadeYoga
description:
Named Best Mat for Grip by Yoga Journal for 2024!

Our most popular mat provides great traction and cushion while still providing stability for standing poses.
Incredible grip, great comfort and eco-friendly

Eco-friendly: Made with natural rubber tapped from rubber trees, a renewable resource

Non-toxic: Jade mats contain no PVC, EVA or other synthetic rubber, and are made in the United States in compliance with all US environmental, labor and consumer protection laws. 

Dimensions: 3/16" thick, 24" wide, available in two lengths: 68" and 74”, and weighs about 5 pounds. (For a wider and longer variety, see Harmony XW at 28" wide)

68" Mat Colors: Purple, Midnight Blue, Olive Green, Black, Jade Green, Raspberry, Slate Blue, Tibetan Orange, Sky Blue, Saffron, Pink, Teal and Sky Blue/Saffron*

74" Mat Colors: Jade Green, Black, Midnight Blue, Olive, Sky Blue, and Purple.

Be The Change: Through our partnership with Trees for the Future, JADE PLANTS A TREE FOR EVERY MAT SOLD – with over TWO MILLION trees planted so far.

*Please note that colors on the screen are approximations and do not match the mats exactly; if you would like to know the exact color of our mats, please visit one of our retailers or email us to request a free sample swatch.
*Please also note that our natural rubber mats are not intended for use outdoors and should not be exposed to sunlight.
*Although Jade mats are 99% latex free, as they are from rubber trees, there may be trace amounts of latex proteins in the mats so we recommend persons with latex allergies avoid contact with our mats.



Jade's Color Cause Program: 100% of profits from the sale of the Saffron/Sky Blue Ukraine mat will be donated to Ukraine TrustChain and Revived Soldiers Ukraine.  $5 will be donated to ovarian cancer causes for every Teal mat purchased, $5 from each Saffron mat will be donated to Autism causes and $5 will be donated to breast cancer causes for every pink mat purchased!  Saffron is available starting in April for Autism Awareness Month, Teal is available starting in September for Ovarian Cancer Awareness Month and Pink is available starting in October for Breast Cancer Awareness Month.

description:
Our Thickest, Longest, Widest Mat: At 5/16" (8mm) thick, the XW Fusion is perfect for the XL yogi, or anyone looking for a mat with enough room to comfortably move and enough cushion for their body.

80" Long and 28" Wide: Wider and longer than your average yoga mat

Incredible grip and ultra comfortable: Never worry about slipping again with our grippy, open cell natural rubber mats.

Eco-Friendly: Made from natural rubber tapped from rubber trees, a renewable resource.

Non-toxic: Jade mats contain no PVC, EVA or other synthetic rubber, and are made in the United States in compliance with all US environmental, labor and consumer protection laws. 

Dimensions: 5/16" (8mm) thick, 28" wide and is available 80" long, in beautiful two tone Purple/Midnight Blue

Be The Change: Through our partnership with Trees for the Future, JADE PLANTS A TREE FOR EVERY MAT SOLD – with over TWO MILLION trees planted so far.

 
*Please note that colors on the screen are approximations and do not match the mats exactly; if you would like to know the exact color of our mats, please visit one of our retailers or email us to request a free sample swatch.
*Please also note that our natural rubber mats are not intended for use outdoors and should not be exposed to sunlight.

name: Fusion Mini Yoga Mat – Eco Friendly and Natural Rubber - JadeYoga
description:
JadeYoga now has Fusion Mini Yoga Mats available! Say goodbye to wrestling with your yoga mat to fold it over to cushion your knees, and hello to the ease and simplicity of extra cushion in the areas you need it most. 

The Fusion Mini Mat is 24” wide, 12” long, and 5/16” (8mm) thick


Place on top of your yoga mat for extra cushion in the areas you need it most

Wide as the average yoga mat for use on top of your existing mat

Room and the cushion to get deep into your poses.

Extra support for Yin yoga and restorative practices, or any time you need it

Natural rubber provides outstanding grip and comfort
Available in two colors, Midnight Blue and Purple, two of our most popular colors. 

Eco-friendly natural rubber is a rapidly renewable resource

name: Organic Cotton Mysore Yoga Rug – JadeYoga
description:
Perfect for Outdoor Use: Jade's organic cotton Mysore yoga rugs are perfect for all kinds of yoga classes, including Ashtanga, outdoor classes, and beach yoga. Please use it on top of your Jade mat to prevent slipping when using it on hard surfaces such as hardwood, laminate, and tile floors.

Organic cotton and all-natural vegetable dyes made from herbs such as indigo, cumin, and turmeric. The herbal dyes are specially made in small batches in order to get the most color and benefits from the herbs.  To see the process of dying our yarns, click here.


Connect to the traditional roots of yoga with the Mysore yoga rug
Dimensions: 26” wide and 72” long, and lightweight at only 2.5 lbs

Handwoven by local artisans in India: These rugs are handwoven by rural artisans in India, preserving a tradition and art form and providing a livelihood for weavers. Weaving is a traditional way of life for many people in this area of India and has seen a huge decline in recent years as it can be very difficult to make a living with weaving and many people have left in search of other jobs. These yoga rugs support the traditional weavers and allow them to use their skills to support their families. For many of them, this is the only job they have ever had and making these rugs allows them to keep this tradition alive.  To see a video with one of our weavers, please click here.  
Care Instructions: Machine washable. Wash colors separately in cold water and hang to dry as rugs may shrink in the wash.

Be The Change: Through our partnership with the Akshaya Patra Foundation, with each Mysore yoga rug purchased, Jade will provide a week of hot lunches for a child in need in India.


*Please note that colors on the screen are approximations and do not match the rugs exactly; if you would like to know the exact color of our rugs, please visit one of our retailers or email us to request a free sample swatch.

name: Meditation Mats – Handwoven Darbha Grass Mats -  JadeYoga
description:
Handwoven Darbha Grass meditation mats will transport you to a natural state of meditation with their earthy grass feel and scent.


Meditate in peace with a Darbha grass mat and enjoy the natural scent of the mat

Made from Darbha grass and cotton. Darbha grass is a tropical grass that grows in India and is considered sacred.

Click here for a review from Business Insider.  

Dimensions: 26" wide and 72" long

Please use over a Jade mat to prevent slipping on hard floors such as hardwood, laminate, or tile floors.

Made by local artisans in India: Jade's Darbha grass meditation mats are handwoven by rural artisans, preserving a tradition and art form and providing a livelihood for weavers. Weaving is a traditional way of life for many people in this area of India and has seen a massive decline in recent years as it can be very difficult to make a living with weaving and many people have left in search of other jobs. These rugs support the traditional weavers and allow them to use their skills to support their families. For many of them, this is the only job they have ever had and making these rugs allows them to keep this tradition alive. Please click here to hear our weaver talk about his work. 

Be The Change: Through our partnership with the Akshaya Patra Foundation, with each Darbha Grass meditation mat purchased, Jade will provide a week of hot lunches for a child in India.

name: Recycled Sari Yoga Rug - JadeYoga
description:
Perfect for Outdoor Use: Jade's recycled sari yoga rugs are perfect for all kinds of yoga classes, including Ashtanga, outdoor classes, and beach yoga. Please use it on top of your Jade mat to prevent slipping when using it on hard surfaces such as hardwood, laminate, and tile floors.

Sustainable: Made with recycled cotton and a mix of Sari Materials which are made of a variety of silk materials. 

Handmade: Created by the Local Women's Handicraft (LWH) in Nepal. LWH seeks to empower and educate women, enabling them to write their own destinies.

Empowering Women: LWH provides a safe space for women who have escaped abusive practices in the textile industry and other injustices in their local communities. Their manufacturing facilities allow these women to learn new skills and crafts as a group to help heal and rehabilitate their spirits.

Ethical Fashion: Through raising awareness and making fashion an ethical way, their goal is to end childhood slavery, forced marriage, and other injustices against women.

Dimensions: 24" x 72"

Care Instructions: Washing: Hand wash or machine wash on gentle cycle, opt for cold water as often as possible. Use lukewarm water when needed. Do not use bleach. Drying: We recommend air-dry only. Do not tumble dry. Our upcycled materials are mainly made from silk fabrics and other materials, silk is very delicate and the high temperatures of the tumble dryer can shrink or damage your silks. Ironing: Iron on low setting if needed.


*Please note that every rug is handmade and colors will vary.

name: Jade Cork Yoga Mat - Hot Yoga - Eco Friendly - JadeYoga
description:
The Perfect Mat For Hot Yoga!

Eco-Friendly: Made with sustainably harvested cork and natural rubber, rapidly renewable resources and contains no PVC*

Great Grip: Cork provides outstanding grip for hot yoga or other sweaty practices

Comfortable: Natural rubber base provides more comfort and resilience 


Dimensions:  4.5mm thick, 24" wide, and 72" long and weight approximately 5 lbs

Be The Change: Through our partnership with Trees for the Future, JADE PLANTS A TREE FOR EVERY MAT SOLD – with over TWO MILLION trees planted so far.


*Made in Spain, the surface of the Jade Cork mat is harvested sustainably from cork trees in Portugal. Trees are not cut down, but after the tree is 25 years old, the bark of the tree is removed. This is repeated every 9 years, with the bark regenerating in the interim - absorbing additional CO2 during this process.
*To Clean: Cork mats can be washed with soap and water then rinsed with water. Hang inside to dry.  Store rolled with cork side out.
*Please note that colors on the screen are approximations and do not match the mats exactly; if you would like to know the exact color of our mats, please visit one of our retailers or email us to request a free sample swatch.

name: Manduka PRO™ Yoga Mat 6mm
description:
A studio-quality yoga mat with unmatched stability and a lifetime guarantee.

The PRO is a high-density yoga mat built to support your home practice. Crafted in Germany since 1997, it delivers floor-like stability with comfortable joint protection, and unmatched durability. A hygienic, closed-cell surface keeps sweat, moisture, and bacteria out of your mat, making it easy to clean and maintain for long-term performance. When you're ready to invest in your home practice, trust the mat that’s built to last with a lifetime guarantee.

name: PROlite® Yoga Mat 4.7mm
description:
The #1 teacher recommended mat mindfully made for a lifetime of flow...on the go.
All the beauty of our signature PRO mat and lighter for on-the-go flow. The PROlite’s super-dense cushioning and textured top layer adapts to your body for unparalleled support and joint protection. A no-slip dot pattern on the bottom layer keeps the mat in place, while closed-cell construction seals out sweat. OEKO-TEX® certified, our PROlite mat is mindfully made for mindful movers.

name: eKO® Yoga Mat 5mm
description: All eKO® Series yoga mats have a closed-cell surface, which will never absorb moisture. Because of this, if you are warm/sweaty at all, the mat will feel slippery, so we always recommend pairing it with one of our hand towels to absorb moisture and provide extra traction or to apply our Yoga Grip Gel during your practice. If you're practicing hot yoga, we recommend a mat towel for full mat coverage. For towel guidance read our Guide to Yoga Towels.

name: eKO® lite Yoga Mat 4mm
description:
A lighter version of our original eKO mat with the same grippy natural rubber top layer and cushioned ride.
Built sustainably for the mindful yogi, the lightweight eKO lite features a naturally grippy Catch-Grip™ surface texture for superior traction combined with our Responsive Ride™ core for a cushioned, springy ride. Sustainably harvested from non-Amazon rubber trees, the eKO lite is made from the planet for practice anywhere on the planet.

name: eKO® Superlite Travel Yoga Mat 1.5mm
description:
Naturally grippy mat made from sustainably harvested tree rubber, in a foldable, travel-ready size.
Designed for yogis on-the-go, the eKO SuperLite combines our signature orange peel top surface in natural rubber for the perfect grip. Our lightest mat to date, this foldable travel-ready mat is built to practice on…anywhere.

name: GRP® Adapt Travel Yoga Mat 1.5mm
description:
The lightest version of our GRP Adapt mat in a foldable, travel-ready size.
Designed with a Satin Grip™ top layer for ultimate grip, the GRP Adapt Travel is the lightest and most versatile option to our GRP Adapt Series, featuring an all grip no slip design in both wet and dry conditions.

name: PRO Travel Yoga Mat 2mm
description:
The #1 mat recommended by teachers worldwide, built to last a lifetime.
Ultra-dense cushioning provides superior support, stability and joint protection.
Closed-cell material seals out moisture and bacteria. Easy to disinfect and clean.
Meticulously crafted in Germany. OEKO-TEX®️ certified.
Pro Tip: Pair with one of our performance towels to increase grip in sweaty sessions.
Standard Length Mat: 2.0 mm thick; 71” x 24”; 2.4 lb

name: PRO® Squared Yoga Mat 6mm
description:
All the same benefits of our PRO mat, in an extra large size for your home yoga sanctuary.
Create your very own home yoga sanctuary or home gym with our PRO Squared yoga mat. This square mat has all the same benefits of our bestselling PRO mat and is supersized to be the ultimate platform for play. The PRO Squared is big enough for two -- there's plenty of room to practice on your own, or with a partner.

name: PRO® Long & Wide Yoga Mat 6mm
description:
All the same benefits of our PRO mat, in a larger size for your home yoga sanctuary or home gym.
Want more mat, but don't have a dedicated workout room or space for it? The PRO Long & Wide can transform your living room into a home studio (and back again) with minimal effort.

name: PROlite® Long & Wide Yoga Mat 4.7mm
description:
All the same benefits of our PROlite mat, in a larger size for your home yoga sanctuary or home gym.
Want more mat, but don't have a dedicated workout room or space for it? The PROlite Long & Wide can transform your living room into a home studio (and back again) with minimal effort.

name: Manduka X Yoga Mat 5mm
description:
One of our most durable and supportive mats built for any yoga or fitness session.
Some of us like to do it all—and that’s who the X mat is built for. Designed with a Double-Weave™ scrim system, this mat provides ultra-durability for any workout routine from yoga to Pilates to cardio. Go barefoot, rock your shoes, take it to the gym…meditate on the beach. With its grippy crosshatch texture, the X mat is the X-factor when it comes to superior fitness support.

name: begin yoga mat 5mm
description:
A thick, cushioned mat with the same high-performance quality at a budget-conscious price.
Looking for a high-performance mat with the same renowned, earth-friendly Manduka craftsmanship…at a lower price? Our Begin mat offers a cushioned ride for easy transitions and joint support, and also features an alignment stripe to guide poses and encourage your continued practice. Reversible and lightweight, Begin is ideal for anyone looking for a high quality mat that’s easy on the wallet.

name: Shala Yoga Rug
description:
A sustainable yoga rug crafted by hand for your outdoor practices and easy flows.























Mindfully made from pre-consumer apparel scraps, the Shala Yoga Rug pays homage to early yogic traditions while also supporting the craftsmanship of artisan weavers. The intricate weave provides support in a machine washable rug for a light flow or meditation at the beach or on an outside surface at your favorite adventure.

If you're practicing hot yoga, we recommend a mat towel for full mat coverage. For towel guidance read our Guide to Yoga Towels.

name: 9-in-1 Foam Roller Set
description:
SAY “SEE YA” TO SORENESS – Suffering from post-workout soreness leaves muscles stiff and painful for days. Get rapid relief from head to toe when you use the 9-in-1 foam roller kit. With Sensu, you can massage, stretch, and roll the pain away!
TOTAL-BODY RELIEF – No matter where you hurt, this 9-in-1 foam rollers set can help. Release deep-tissue pain with the foam roller, massage stick, lacrosse ball, or spikey ball. Tight muscles don’t stand a chance when you use the 3 resistance bands for stretching. And for your back pain, the peanut ball has got your back.
THE TRAVEL-FRIENDLY MASSAGER – Your sore muscles travel with you, so your massage roller set should, too. Bring your favorite natural pain reliever to the gym, on the road, and everywhere in between—the muscle rollers set comes with its own carrying bag!
MORE THAN A MASSAGE – Your massage foam-roller kit doesn’t stop at pain relief. Recover faster, perform better, and prevent injuries with Sensu, so you can crush your next workout! Plus, massage rollers are known to help break up scar tissue, increase flexibility, improve mobility, and even aid rehabilitation.

Why Stay Sore when You Can Roll with Sensu?
After an intense gym session, simple tasks like walking or getting dressed become difficult. Don’t just tough it out! Roll it out with the massage foam roller set by Sensu. With 9 pieces this Muscle Roller Set is designed to target deep-tissue pain, trigger points, fascia, and more, you grow stronger and more relaxed with every massage.
Let’s Get Rolling
Your foam roller can break up scar tissue and accelerates the healing process for larger muscle groups, foam rolling can be an effective tool to add to your warm-up or cooldown, before and after exercise.
Band Together to Resist Post-Workout Tightness
Don’t overlook a resistance-band workout or stretch. Personalize each exercise with 3 different bands:

Blue: Light 10–15 lbs. band
Yellow: Medium 15–20 lbs. band
Red: Heavy 25–30 lbs. band

Have a Ball
Up your ball game with the 3 massage balls! The peanut ball stabilizes the spine as you roll out your back and neck. Improve the myofascial system and increase blood flow with the PVC spikey ball. Rid muscle fatigue and soreness with the durable and dense rubber lacrosse ball.
Eco-Friendly Foam
Foam that’s lightweight, durable, and environmentally friendly? That’s what the foam roller and peanut ball are made of. Recyclable and free from nasty chemicals, EPP foam gives you the sturdiness you need in massagers without harming the environment.
When the suffering stops, real workouts can happen. Massage the pain away with the Sensu 9-in-1 Foam Roller Set when you add one to your cart TODAY!

name: Large Exercise Mat
description:
THE SUPERIOR SURFACE – Chisel up or stretch out with Sensu’s gym mat! At 8.5mm thickness, your high-density workout mats for home gyms cushion bones and stabilize balance so you can crush it!

STEP UP WITH NO SLIP – Stay steady through each sweat sesh with your workout mats! Your 6x4 ft. fitness mat features a nonslip, non-skid bottom and top, enabling maximum muscle control and focus.

NO FOUL, ALL FITNESS – Pump up on a pure surface! Unlike PVC gym mats, your 16P-ECO large exercise mat is odorless and kid-safe, free of problem-causing materials such as rubber, latex, phthalates, and heavy metals!

BUILT-IN BENEFITS – Advance your exercise with these extra features! Your jump rope mat includes a soft, 72"x 26" towel for mopping up and a zippered case with a shoulder strap for easy carrying!

Equip Your Exercise with This Superior Set
Don’t let a slippery, unforgiving gym floor wreck your workout. Set up and step up with professional supplies from Sensu! Your thick workout mat provides a comfortable, durable, and stable surface for each set and rep, while a towel and carrying case make muscling up extra rewarding. Upgrade your home gym and discover the difference!
Reap the Perks of Professional Design
Bump up your workout with these benefits!

Extra-Large: Jump, lunge, and stretch on your 183cm x 122cm (6 x 4 foot) deadlift mat!
Ultra-Thick: Crush it in comfort with a high-density, 8.5mm extra thick exercise mat.
Nonslip: Forget mats that slip and slide. Your gym floor mats feature nonskid bottoms AND tops!
Pure: Muscle up on kid-safe materials free of rubber, latex, phthalates, dioxins, furans, or heavy metals.
Odorless: Goodbye smelly, unhealthy PVC. And hello odorless, non-toxic 16P-ECO!

Beef Up, Towel Down
Stop slips by soaking up sweat in your included towel! Soft, ultra-absorbent microfiber mops your brow and your mat, saving you from slip-ups and stinging eyes. 72" x 26" in size ensures your towel is up to any drying task, while machine-washable material makes keeping fresh effortless!
Athletics To-Go
No need to clutter your gym bag. Carry your gym floor mat in your set’s case! Your case features game-changing conveniences such as:

Sturdy, waterproof material
Adjustable shoulder strap
Secure zippered closure
Accessible, large opening

Give the Gift of Fitness
Pursuing the perfect gift for the gym guru or fitness fanatic in your life? Delight him or her with gym mats for home workouts from Sensu! With its professional quality and extra essentials, your gift is sure to be a hit!
Upgrade your equipment to dominate your exercise TODAY. Add Sensu’s exercise mat set to your cart!

name: Large Yoga Mat
description:
TURN ANY UNFORGIVING SURFACE INTO A SACRED WORKOUT SPACE – Move freely without restriction, and without the pain of hard floors from thin tiny yoga mats with this 6’x4’ portable workout space by Sensu! Its extra thick, comes with Carry Bag, Large Yoga Towel and Mat Grips which allows you to go anywhere and always move with freedom!

30% MORE CUSHION – Most yoga mats like this are 7mm thick, but ours is 9mm! While it may not sound like much, your joints, elbows and knees will feel better for it when doing your exercises, and will enjoy the extra comfort from hard floors. That extra 2mm thickness ensures the best combo of comfort and stability. Need more softness? We include a soft large microfiber yoga towel for you to use on top!

A SAFER TRAINING MAT – Goodbye smelly, unhealthy PVC. And hello odorless, non-toxic 16P-ECO! Not only is it a non-slip mat for all exercise, but it’s free from the 16 types of Harmful Phthalates, Biodegradable and is also kid safe! We also include 4x Sticky Grips for extra stability if you decide you need it.

TRAVELS WITH YOU – While other brands make you wrestle with transporting your wide yoga mat, Sensu helps you take this one anywhere! Roll it up and secure it with the Velcro straps, then, slide it easily in the large opening of your waterproof carry bag. Zip it, adjust the comfy straps and carry it anywhere. The non-absorbent surface is also easy to clean. Simply wipe sweat or water with a cloth.

WITH A LIFETIME WARRANTY – This large, thick yoga mat, is made for barefoot or ballet slippers only (no shoes) and perfect for Pilates, yoga and other low impact / low intensity activity like stretching, meditating or a little Savasana recharge. And when you do that, it’ll last a lifetime without damage! So, forget about mats that don’t let you fully move, or interlocking foam tiles and try the Sensu Mat now.

Turn Any Unforgiving Surface into a Sacred Workout Space!
For those who don’t want the fuss of interlocking tiles, and for anyone who needs room to spread their wings (and limbs) you’ve probably seen the latest in large yoga and workout mats. But for anyone who suffers with knee or joint pain, those exercise mats are still a bit hard. So, we created a large workout/yoga/ Pilates mat with 30% Extra Cushion! And while that 2mm extra padding seems small, you’ll be surprised to know it makes a BIG difference in comfort, without sacrificing stability.

Large Yoga Mat Comes with Carry Bag, Towel and Floor Grips 9mm Thick Padding

Whether you’re practicing at home, in the studio, or outdoors, the Peaceful Mountain Yoga Mat serves as a constant reminder of the tranquility and strength found in nature. Allow its calming presence to enhance your yoga experience, making each session a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of daily life.
Our mountain design was inspired by the refreshed feeling of being surrounded by nature.
This mat has been upgraded to an extended size of 72 x 26 inches.
Free gift : Carry strap is included!

name: Garden of Flower Cork Yoga Mat
description:

Crafted with earth-tone colors that mirror the soothing hues of the soil and the elevated pinks of Magnolia blossoms, this mat evokes a sense of calm while symbolizing the purity and resilience of Magnolias. As you unroll this mat, you are transported on to a magical garden, leaving behind the chaos of the outside world and reconnecting with your inner self.
Free gift : Carry strap is included

name: Original Cork Yoga Mat
description:
Our classic mat puts the beauty of cork center stage. The eco-friendly quality of the mat not only provides a gentle and accommodating feeling to the body but also helps you enjoy the maximum effect of yoga exercise.
One beautiful thing about Cork Yoga Mat is its ability to withstand sweat, unlike some yoga mats which begin to peel and scratch under constant sweat. 
Free gift : Carry strap is included

name: 7 Chakras Cork Yoga Mat
description:
Awaken your energy centers with our 7 Chakras Cork Yoga Mat, featuring vibrant colors that represent each chakra. This design promotes balance and harmony in your practice, aligning your physical and spiritual self. The mat’s vivid hues not only enhance your focus but also inspire a deeper connection to your inner energy. Crafted for yogis of all levels, this mat provides a non-slip surface and optimal cushioning. Let the 7 Chakras design inspire your journey towards equilibrium and well-being, infusing your practice with vibrant energy and holistic balance.
Free gift : Carry strap is included

name: KOI Fish Cork Yoga Mat
description:
From our designer: "This concept captures the essence of zen, featuring a calm and peaceful pond adorned with waterlilies and gracefully swimming koi. I chose the elegant butterfly Koi, known for their long, flowing fins and tails, adding a touch of beauty and movement to the design. Complementing the koi, water lettuce has been included for its decorative appeal, enhancing the overall aesthetic and staying true to the initial concept. In Japanese culture, Koi fish symbolize luck and prosperity, while the waterlilies, akin to lotuses, represent rebirth and resurrection." 
This artwork is brought to you by Yohanes Ragil, an Illustrator/Graphic Designer based in Bali, Indonesia. His works are usually inspired by nature and cultures (especially Southeast Asian) with a style inspired by lino-cut technique in a monochromatic palette. 
Free gift : Carry strap is included

description:

This design exudes grace and movement, with the phoenix symbolizing loyalty and prosperity, and the azaleas representing abundance and love, creating a piece rich in meaning and elegance.
This artwork is brought to you by Yohanes Ragil, a designer based in Bali, Indonesia. His works are usually inspired by nature and cultures (especially Southeast Asian) with a style inspired by lino-cut technique in a monochromatic palette.

name: XL Blue Whale Cork Yoga Mat (80"x26"x6mm)
description:
This design is inspired by our deep love for the ocean. The whale tail represents freedom and joy — a graceful moment when the whale leaps above the water, symbolizing harmony and connection with nature. It also reminds us to protect our oceans and the incredible life within them.
Created by artist Amanda Rasmitha, this design was originally painted using watercolor techniques. We transformed her artwork onto the cork surface, and after multiple color tests, we are happy to bring it to life with the vivid blue shades that capture the spirit and serenity of the sea.
The mat also features instructional alignment lines to help guide your poses and support balance.
Free gift : Carry strap is included

name: XL The Earth Cork Yoga Mat (80"x26"x6mm)
description:
Our Latest Design Is Here 💚
Find your center on this beautifully crafted cork mat, where warm, earthy tones meet vibrant green botanicals. A radiant globe takes center stage, reminding us that every movement connects us to something greater than ourselves.
Lush green forest details frame your flow—ferns and palms above, evergreens below—inviting you into a natural sanctuary where you can breathe, stretch, and simply be. The alignment lines are there to support your practice and poses.
Crafted from sustainable cork with rich green accents throughout, this mat is a celebration of our beautiful planet.

name: Yoga Mat Forest Design
description:
This artwork is created by Emma Hall : "I was really inspired by retro floral patterns from the 60s and 70s that use this clearly hand-drawn element to create a more fun and organic pattern. My aim was to infuse these patterns with modern colors and details to give them a more modern edge. To create the design I use purely hand-drawings which are then scanned and vectorised to allow resizing and colouring."Emma is a British designer from Cambridge. Her biggest joy in her work is colour. The process involved usually centres around mixing analogue and digital methods. Subjects are generally drawn from nature, such as, imagined or real African landscapes, wildflowers and animals. Her travels growing up and Mozambican heritage may have also contributed to these interests. This design is featured on a premium vegan suede yoga mat, combining Emma's vibrant artistry with eco-conscious functionality.
Free gift : Carry strap is included

name: Kids Combo Yoga Mat - Geo Blue
description:
THE KID‚ is MAT
        
            Perfect for virtual PE classes, this extra-durable mat offers a softgrip and cushion to support your child‚ is playful yoga practice. 4.5mm of natural tree rubber is bonded to an ultra-absorbent 
                microfiber towel layer.
        
    
    
 PRO TIP
        
            For optimal grip, wet your hands or spritz a little water on your mat before practice. Sweat will also help you adhere to your mat.
        
    
    
 EARTH CONSCIOUS
        
            Natural tree rubber base, recycled PET microfiber, and water-based inks.
            Free of silicone, toxic glue, and phthalates.
        
    
    
 CARE INSTRUCTIONS
        
            Depending on the type of practice, how much you sweat, and personal preference, we recommend washing your Combo Mat every 1-3 uses. If you choose to not wash your mat, hang to dry away from direct 
                sunlight. Roll with the patterned side on the outside for storage or travel. 
            
            We recommend hand-washing to extend the life of your mat. If you choose to machine wash, please do so on a gentle cycle with a machine without a center agitator. Hang to dry away from direct sunlight.
            
        
    
    
 DETAILS
        
            4 mm of natural tree rubber base + recycled PET microfiber top layer60 in (152 cm) x 24 in (61 cm) x 4 mm, 3.5 lb (1.6 kg)
            Carrying Strap Included

name: Travel Cork Yoga Mat - Mandala Black
description:
THE CORK MAT

Unlike most of our competition, our Cork Mat is made with a 100% natural rubber base layer topped with a renewable, sustainable cork top layer.
While natural cork provides superior wet and dry grip, it is ideal in heated and hot yoga classes because as temperatures rise, cork begins to loosen and becomes softer & easier to grip. It's also moisture-activated - becoming grippier as it gets wet. Truly nature's best solution for towel-free traction. Cork is also closed-cell and naturally anti-microbial, sealing out moisture & resisting odor and bacteria from sweat.
Our natural rubber base layer offers a unique springy ride that cushions and protects joints, while also remaining stable and supportive in any pose. Stays put on the floor better than foam base layers and provides denser cushioning.
The stunning, symmetrical pattern helps guide alignment, and is printed using a non-fade water-based ink.
Note:  The foldable 1.5mm option is excellent for yogis on the go, and also provides an excellent non-slip, natural "topper" to other mats.



 PRO TIP

For optimal grip, lightly spritz your mat with water before practice.



 DURABLE

Supports any practice from a high intensity workout to a gentle flow. Suitable for shoes.



 EARTH CONSCIOUS

 

Sustainable, renewable cork top layer made from the outer layer of bark from the cork oak tree. (Cork trees are the only tree in the world that regenerate stripped bark.)
Base layer is made with natural, non-Amazonian harvested tree rubber.
All of our beautiful designs are printed with water-based inks.
Phthalate, silicone and toxin-fee.




 CARE INSTRUCTIONS

To clean, wipe with a soft towel dampened with soap and water; lay flat or hang to air dry.
Roll with the colored/designed side on the outside.



 DIMENSIONS

70"(178 cm) long x 24"(61 cm) wide
1.5mm thick = 3.5 lb (1.6 kg)
Includes carrying strap

name: Combo Yoga Mat - Mandala Sapphire
description:
THE COMBO MAT

The Combo Mat was designed to be the ultimate hot yoga and sweaty companion. An ultra-absorbent and colorful microfiber towel top layer, bonded to a natural tree rubber base.
Perfect for a sweaty grip or for added balance stability; No more towel bunching, as this is an ALL-in-ONE product.



 PRO TIP

For optimal grip, wet your hands or spritz a little water on your mat before practice. Sweat will also help you adhere to your mat.



 EARTH CONSCIOUS

Natural tree rubber base, recycled PET microfiber, and water-based inks. Free of silicone, toxic glue, and phthalates.



 CARE INSTRUCTIONS

Depending on the type of practice, how much you sweat, and personal preference, we recommend washing your Combo Mat every 1-3 uses. If you choose to not wash your mat, hang to dry away from direct sunlight. Roll with the patterned side on the outside for storage or travel.
We recommend hand-washing to extend the life of your mat. If you choose to machine wash, please do so on a gentle cycle with a machine without a center agitator. Hang to dry away from direct sunlight.



 DETAILS

3.5 mm of natural tree rubber + recycled PET microfiber top layer70 in (178 cm) x 24 in (61 cm) x 3.5 mm, 4.9 lb (2.2 kg)Includes carrying strap

name: Yogamatters Aqua Evolve Yoga Mat
description:
Sustainability innovation at its best - a yoga mat that actually helps to clean the environment!
The Yogamatters Aqua Evolve yoga mat is made from a unique combination of EVA foam and algae from lakes and ponds. 
Algae blooms pose a major problem for communities around the world causing eco-systems to become out of balance. They are caused by factors such as climate change, water pollution from agriculture, industry and society.
Our partners at BLOOM have found an innovative way of helping the environment by turning algae blooms into eco-foams for use in products. 
During algae harvesting, the algae is separated from the water and the clean, filtered and oxygenated water is returned back into the environment. Helping to restore the eco-system. Algae also absorbs and traps CO2 from the atmosphere through the process of photosynthesis. When the algae is harvested, the CO2 comes along with it, which means cleaner air too!
For every mat, 64 litres of cleaned water are returned to the local habitat as well as 40 cubic metres of clean air. 

Uses reclaimed/recycled materials certified by the Global Recycling Standard (GRS) 
Eco-friendly
Vegan
Lightweight and portable at 750 grams
Free from latex, PVC, toxic chemicals and dyes
5mm thickness for super cushioning
Made in Spain

Please keep the mat out of direct sunlight and hot places. Store in a cool, dry place.

Product improves with use over time 
To Store: Roll Manduka PROlite yoga mats with the top side (fabric-finish) facing outwards. This keeps the corners of the mat flat when practising.
To Break In: The surface texture of PROlite yoga mats improves with use. Our customers have found that the best way to “break in” their yoga mat is to use it on a daily basis. Another trick is to sprinkle coarse sea salt over your mat, use a light spritz of water, and scrub it down with a stiff brush before allowing to air dry in the sunshine.

name: Manduka eKO Lite 3.0 4mm Yoga Mat
description:
Built sustainably for the mindful yogi, the updated Manduka eKO® lite 4mm yoga mat provides an improved Catch-Grip™ surface texture for traction in wet and dry conditions, combined with Responsive Ride™ layer for a cushioned, springy ride. Sustainably manufactured from recycled non-Amazon harvested tree rubber, the eKO lite supports both your practice and our planet.
All Manduka eKO® Series yoga mats have a closed-cell surface, which will never absorb moisture. Because of this, if you are warm or sweaty, the yoga mat will feel slippery, so we always recommend pairing it with a hand towel to absorb moisture and provide extra traction or to apply Yoga Grip Gel during your practice. If you're practicing hot yoga, we recommend a mat towel for full mat coverage.

name: Manduka eKO Superlite Travel Mat
description:
The Manduka eKO® SuperLite yoga mat is a superior lightweight yoga mat that provides excellent grip while being thin enough to fold and pack easy for traveling. Wherever your practice takes you, the eKO® SuperLite is the best yoga mat for yogis on the go!

Fold + go for ultimate portability
Easily put it on top of a studio's mat for your own personal surface and extra grip
Made with a unique closed-cell top surface which prevents moisture from entering the mat, keeping it clean and in good condition longer than other natural rubber mats
Tightly woven scrim resists tearing or stretching
Made from biodegradable, non-Amazon harvested, natural tree rubber with non-toxic foaming agents and non-AZO dyes
Due to their biodegradable nature, the eKO® Series is not recommended for a daily vigorous practice
Usage of the eKO® Series in a hot environment requires regular care to maintain the performance of the rubber
99% Latex-free. Not recommended for those with Latex sensitivities
No PVC
No harmful plasticizers

description:

made in the UK
sustainable plant-based materials
suitable for vegans
100% natural rubber (contains latex)
biodegradable
excellent grip / non-slip

Please note that the weave of the jute is such that some loose threads and nubs are normal. There is also a 10% allowance on the jute exposure as 100% natural raw materials will not always be 100% consistent. Due to the nature of the materials, if the mat is subject to very heavy use, it may degrade quicker than some other less eco-friendly mats. Colours can have slight variations. Also, 100% natural rubber has a tendency to bloom which can appear on the surface as a mild dusty coating - it can be wiped off with water.

no towel bunching or moving around during your class

name: Yoga Design Lab Cork Mat 3.5mm - Natural Balance
description:
The Cork Yoga Mat is the most sustainable choice within yoga mats.
Cork is lightweight, allowing for more efficient shipping to the factory. The yoga mat cork is supported by a base of natural non-slip rubber from Vietnam. Only water-based inks are used for the prints, leaving you with a fully sustainable and beautiful piece of art. Cork is antimicrobial, meaning you don’t need harmful chemicals to clean your collection. Organic soap and water are sufficient and if you get any major stains, you can actually file down the cork a bit and avoid cleaners altogether!

Designed to love the earth and your practice
Non-slip grip that improves with sweat
High-density cushion for support
Durable: Premium quality for the most rigorous studio conditions or at home
Eco-friendly: biodegradable natural cork and rubber with water-based inks
Free from silicone, pvc, and phthalates
Easy to Clean: antimicrobial cork
Includes carrying strap


Cork trees grow around the Mediterranean naturally and on farms. The mat cork is sourced and certified from tree farms in Portugal. The bark of the cork tree can be harvested every 9-10 years during its 200-year life span. The tree is not harmed during the process; it actually allows for greater absorption of CO2 while the bark regrows.
If a tree does reach its end life, two new saplings are planted in its place thus ensuring the cork forest continues to flourish and renew. The harvested cork bark is shredded to a pulp and pressed into long sheets to be used in products. Any leftover cork dust is used to fuel the mills.
If you no longer need your products, cork is compostable. Better yet, you can find a local agency to upcycle your cork or find DIY inspiration online to upcycle your cork.

name: Jade Yoga Organic Cotton Mysore Yoga Rug
description:
Back to the roots - With Jade's organic cotton Mysore yoga rugs you can feel closer to the traditional roots of Yoga. They're perfect for all kinds of yoga, including Ashtanga, outdoor classes, and beach yoga. 
Jade`s Mysore rugs are handwoven by rural artisans in India, preserving a tradition and art form and providing a livelihood for weavers. Weaving is a traditional way of life for many people in this region, which has experienced an enormous decline in recent years due to increasing industrialization. These rugs support the traditional weavers and enable them to use their skills to support their families as well as to keep this tradition alive.
They are made with organic cotton and all natural vegetable dyes made from herbs including indigo, cumin and turmeric. The herbal dyes are specially made in small batches in order to get the most color and benefits from the herbs.
These rugs are lightweight at only 1.13kg and can easily be taken outdoors to the park or the beach. They are also machine washable with cold water, making them easy to care for. (note that rugs may shrink slightly in the wash). Wash colours separately and hang to air dry (will shrink if put in a dryer).
When using on hard surfaces such as hardwood, laminate and tile floors, please use on top of your Jade mat (natural rubber mats) or other non-slip underlay to prevent slipping.
With the purchase of each rug, Jade provides a week of hot lunches to a child in need in India.

Designed to be reversible to accommodate different styles of yoga.  The smooth side is perfect for a gentle Hatha, Restorative or Yin practice and the dotted side provides a stable grip for a dynamic practice making it a versatile option for a yoga studio. 
Our Studio Yoga Mat has a longer option at 210cm length, also available as a wholesale box of 7 yoga mats - ideal for yoga studios. Please have a look at our other colour matching props here.

Made in Germany

name: Yoga Design Lab Cork Mat 3.5mm - Mandala Black
description:
The Cork Yoga Mat is the most sustainable choice within yoga mats.
Cork is lightweight, allowing for more efficient shipping to the factory. The yoga mat cork is supported by a base of natural non-slip rubber from Vietnam. Only water-based inks are used for the prints, leaving you with a fully sustainable and beautiful piece of art. Cork is antimicrobial, meaning you don’t need harmful chemicals to clean your collection. Organic soap and water are sufficient and if you get any major stains, you can actually file down the cork a bit and avoid cleaners altogether!

Designed to love the earth and your practice.
Non-slip grip that improves with sweat
Symmetrical design aids alignment
High-density cushion for support
Durable: Premium quality for the most rigorous studio conditions or at home
Eco-friendly: biodegradable natural cork and rubber with water-based inks.
Free from silicone, pvc, and phthalates
Easy to Clean: antimicrobial cork
Includes carrying strap

Cork trees grow around the Mediterranean naturally and on farms. The mat cork is sourced and certified from tree farms in Portugal. The bark of the cork tree can be harvested every 9-10 years during its 200-year life span. The tree is not harmed during the process; it actually allows for greater absorption of CO2 while the bark regrows.
If a tree does reach its end life, two new saplings are planted in its place thus ensuring the cork forest continues to flourish and renew. The harvested cork bark is shredded to a pulp and pressed into long sheets to be used in products. Any leftover cork dust is used to fuel the mills.
If you no longer need your products, cork is compostable. Better yet, you can find a local agency to upcycle your cork or find DIY inspiration online to upcycle your cork.

name: Yoga Design Lab Studio Mat 3.5mm - Celestial
description:
This premium eco-friendly yoga mat/towel combination from Yoga Design Lab was designed to be the ultimate yoga companion.
Ideal for hot yoga, any dynamic sweaty practice, Pilates and general exercise, these Yoga Design Lab Studio Mats come in a range of stylish and distinctive designs for you to choose from. Luxurious and absorbent sueded microfibre (made of recycled plastic bottles) bonded to a natural tree rubber base gives you the wet grip of a towel (that grips better the more you sweat) with the cushion of a yoga mat and a responsive grip to reduce injuries. You'll no longer need to bring a mat and towel to yoga class anymore!

no towel bunching or moving around during your class
eco-friendly - biodegradable, recyclable, 100% natural tree rubber
water-based inks free from silicone, toxic glue, and phthalates
comes with durable carrying strap

At the beginning of your practice, lightly spraying water on the top surface of the mat will prevent sliding if you have dry hands and feet.

The Ultra is made with a closed cell structure and contains an antibacterial formula both components stopping bacteria from growing or odours developing. Finished with bevelled edges which blend into the floor so movement can seamlessly extend beyond the body of the mat.

name: Aura Cork Yoga Mat
description: The Aura was created with comfort and sustainability in mind. Made from renewable materials, our most cushioned yoga mat provides added support for your joints. We developed a fine-grain cork surface for a soft feel, yet with no sacrifice on grip, which increases with moisture. Our signature plant foam bottom is optimized for stability and energy return. The Aura will completely change your perspective on how a yoga mat can be so light, yet durable and high-performing.

name: Unity Pro Cork Yoga Mat
description: Introducing the Unity Pro, our most durable and sustainable yoga mat to date. Crafted from 83% USDA-certified renewable materials, this mat is thoughtfully engineered to balance peak performance with superior comfort. Its unique cork and natural rubber blend creates an unmatched non-slip surface in wet or dry conditions, ensuring stability and confidence in every pose, making it the ideal choice for any style of practice.

name: Original Cork Yoga Mat
description: The Original reimagines how a yoga mat made from 51% renewable materials can be so high-performing for any practice. The world’s first cork yoga mat uses a premium layer of extra thick cork for a grounded, non-slip experience dry or wet with no need for a towel. Our signature Plant Foam bottom is optimized for cushion, stability, and energy return.

name: Nomad Cork Yoga Mat
description: Meet our extra light and ultra versatile yoga mat made with renewable materials. A premium layer of eco-friendly cork provides a non-slip and antimicrobial surface that is easy to care for and maintain. A luxuriously dense plant foam base, free of PVC’s and latex gives added comfort and support. If your practice takes you to the local studio, beach, a mindful hike or on your next big adventure the Nomad will be there for you.

name: Nomad Air Cork Yoga Mat
description: Meet the most portable cork yoga mat ever created. The Nomad Air is designed to fold or roll making it an extra compact mat that you can take with you anywhere you go.  Features a premium layer of eco-friendly cork on top for a non-slip surface that is easy to care for and maintain. A thin natural rubber bottom for unmatched durability that grips to any surface. If your practice takes you to the local studio, beach, a mindful hike or on your next big adventure the nomad air will be there for you.

name: Nomad XL Cork Yoga Mat
description: The Extra-Large Nomad measures 80″ x 48″, offering an expansive practice space ideal for home studios, gyms, and more. Its premium eco-friendly cork surface delivers a naturally non-slip layer that is both easy to clean and maintain. Beneath, a luxuriously dense plant foam base provides exceptional comfort and support. Weighing just 4.5 lbs, the Nomad XL is conveniently portable, making it as versatile as it is high-performing.

name: Mountain Magic Unity Pro XL Cork Yoga Mat
